message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident it will be worth every penny. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,800. I'm looking to save as much as I can, and I think that's a fair price for the product.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $9,800 is unfortunately too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This still leaves you a good amount of profit, and it's a fair price for the value of the product. Let's make a deal!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $10,500 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $10,250. Can you consider that?
